last_improved_things.summary: Enhanced 3D model documentation with animation controls, material types, origin/center points, and shadow configuration
Improved core behavior documentation: added Window Center anchor option, draggable collision mask and Z-order details, destroy outside parameters
Enhanced pathfinding documentation with grid offset properties, path smoothing, obstacle cost clarification, and activation behavior
Improved UI and visual object documentation: enhanced light, button, slider, text, panel sprite, and particle emitter pages with detailed properties and usage tips
Enhanced tween behavior documentation with scale center options, color modes, exponential interpolation, and effect properties
Enhanced Spine object documentation with animation control details, point attachments, skins, mixing duration, and coordinate systems
Improved bitmap text and shape painter documentation: added alignment properties, wrapping width, and comprehensive list of all shape types
Improved variables documentation: added array/structure manipulation operations, object variable use-case guidance, and fixed physics2 typos
Improved platformer and top-down movement docs: added ladder climbing, jumpthru drop-through, ledge grab clarifications, and isometric viewpoint options
Improved sprite and video object docs: added blend modes, color/tint, flip operations, animation speed scale, and fixed video typos and playback speed range
Improved audio docs with fade, pitch/rate, seeking, unload, and spatial sound; improved linked objects docs with bidirectional links, auto-cleanup, and use cases
Improved events docs: fixed truncated sentence and added execution-flow diagram in async.md, fixed backtick typo in while/index.md, removed stray word in gamejolt publishing doc

Improved scene editor docs: fixed broken URL in scene-editor/index.md, added enable/disable effect and parameter type info to layer-effects.md, and added lighting layer and follow-base-layer-camera docs to layers-and-cameras.md
